resources.string:
Featuring garden views, The Loft by Cityworkers has accommodations with a garden and a terrace, around 0.6 km from Cathedral of Our Lady. 

Guests staying at this apartment can use the free WiFi and a fully equipped kitchen. 

The apartment consists of 2 separate bedrooms, 2 bathrooms with free toiletries and a hair dryer, and a seating area. A flat-screen TV is available. Popular points of interest near the apartment include Plantin-Moretus Museum, MAS Museum Antwerp and Groenplaats Antwerp. Deurne Airport is 8 km from the property. 

Antwerp Center is a great choice for travelers interested in museums, clothes shopping and cafes. This is our guests' favorite part of Antwerp, according to independent reviews. 

We speak your language!
Grote Pieter Potstraat 1 Verdieping 2, Antwerp Center, 2000 Antwerp, Belgium
